## NFTCollection.ownerOf() method

Get the current owner of the given NFT

**Signature:**

```typescript
ownerOf(nftAddress: string): Promise<string | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type   | Description                                     |
| ---------- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------- |
| nftAddress | string | the mint address of the NFT to get the owner of |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string \| undefined&gt;

the owner of the NFT

## Example

```jsx
const nftAddress = "...";
const owner = await program.ownerOf(nftAddress);
console.log(owner);
```
